TopicTitle: KSP 1.1.3 crashes in SPH and VAB

Articles.Content:
Recently KSP has begun crashing constantly whenever I am in the SPH or VAB. Flying ships around is fine but as soon as I spend more than a few minutes building the game crashes. Every time it says "Write to location ******** caused an access violation."

Crash report: http://pastebin.com/QKU9p1ME

System Specs:

  • Intel i7 3770k
  • GTX 770 2GB
  • 8 GB RAM
  • 256 GB Samsung 840 pro SSD
  • 1TB WD hard drive
  • crappy 850W power supply

Things I have done to try to fix the problem:

  • Deleted local content with Steam and reinstalled KSP
  • Deleted everything in the KSP Folder and redownloaded it
  • Verified The integrity of the game cache many, many times
  • Disabled nearly all background programs to make sure none of them were interfering with KSP

Edit:

    crash logs and system specs:          https://www.dropbox.com/sh/5p4xfy641bvrb39/AADBKXZkq8inJHbiQxw2kvz3a?dl=0    http://pastebin.com/c9JDudgk

Edited August 13, 2016 by Dwerto
Hi @Dwerto, can you please upload the full crash log, the output_log.txt and your dxdiag hardware report, thank you.

I am having a similar problem on mac. Every time I am in the SPH or VAB and accidentally click on a part in the menu whilst I am moving my mouse, it gets the little loading wheel and I have to force quit KSP.
